name: to int
filter false overrides
Logo / Clock
format:
<script id="clockScript1" type="text/javascript">
    var clockInterval;
    $(function () {
        if (clockInterval) return;

        //add logo
        var div1 = $('<div/>');
        var logo = new Image();

        logo.src = '/logo.png'
        logo.height = 45;
        div1[0].style.margin = '10px auto';

        div1.append(logo);

        //add clock
        var div2 = $('<div/>');
        var p = $('<p/>');

        div2.append(p);
        div2[0].style.margin = '5px';

        function displayTime() {
            p.text(new Date().toLocaleString());
        }
        
        clockInterval = setInterval(displayTime, 1000);

        //add to toolbar when it's available
        var addToToolbarTimer;
        
        function addToToolbar() {
            var toolbar = $('.md-toolbar-tools');
            
            if(!toolbar.length) return;
            
            toolbar.append(div1);
            toolbar.append(div2);
            clearInterval(addToToolbarTimer);
        }
        addToToolbarTimer = setInterval(addToToolbar, 100);
    });
</script>

name: prepare for database
func:
msg.payload = {
    fehler1:                msg.payload[0],
    fehler2:                msg.payload[1],
    stroerung:              msg.payload[2],
    warnung:                msg.payload[3],
    warnung_quittier:       msg.payload[4],
    geblaese_warnung1:      msg.payload[5],
    geblaese_warnung2:      msg.payload[6],
    geblaese_warnung3:      msg.payload[7],
    betriebsart:            msg.payload[8],
    betriebszustand:        msg.payload[9],
    leistung_lastbetrieb:   msg.payload[10],
    kesseltemperatur:       msg.payload[11],
    restsauerstoff:         msg.payload[15],
}
return msg;
